mapper.select: SELECT MT.TASK_NAME taskName , MT.TASK_STATUS taskStatus FROM MKT_TASK_INFO MT WHERE 1=1 AND MT.STAFF_ID = #{staffId} AND MT.START_DATE ORDER BY MT.START_DATE DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT YEAR(t.BIZ_DATE) AS staffName, GROUP_CONCAT(t.PERF_ACPH SEPARATOR ',') perfAcphStr FROM MKT_STF_PERF t WHERE STAFF_ID = #{staffId} GROUP BY staffName
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MT.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, GROUP_CONCAT(MT.`STATUS` SEPARATOR ',') status FROM PUB_VIFY_LIST MT WHERE MT.CREATE_USER = #{createUser} GROUP BY MT.CREATE_TIME
SELECT t.MSG_CONTENT FROM pub_poit_msg t WHERE t.MSG_TYPE = '1' AND t. STATUS = '2' AND t.CREATE_USER = #{staffId} ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 3
